documents.document:
Idle Spicy Kitchen

When it comes to local takeaway food in Idle things don't get much hotter than Idle Spicy Kitchen, in every sense of the word! They aim to provide the best authentic and high quality cuisine with premier service and value backed up by years of experience within the field. Expect excellent curry, pizza, burger, calzones, pasta and more! Check out our user friendly, secure and easy online ordering menus to explore the constantly evolving selection of food on offer, we'll have your mouth watering in no time!Open seven days a week from 17:00 to midnight (and two hours later on Friday and Saturday!) and providing free delivery on minimum orders of six pounds, within the local area, this is already an extremely easy to access outlet but when you add the simple and secure online ordering that MyHungryBelly prides itself on and ordering food in for a memorable night in has never been easier. No more searching your mobile directory or dog eared bits of paper for takeaway numbers, you have the full range of choice in your local area a few mouse clicks away.Order Food Online today with Idle Spicy Kitchen, Albion Road, Bradford and MyHungryBelly.com and make your culinary life that bit simpler!

Immy's Spice Ranch (Tyersal Road)

Immy's Spice Rance is among the finest local takeaways in Bradford offering free delivery and a great selection of quality, mouth watering food. Immy's have teamed up with My Hungry Belly, the finest online order takeaway resource around to make enjoying all they have to offer easier than ever to access. This could prove a lifesaver if you ever find your cupboards bear or want to share a treat with your family or friends. A great night-in just doesn't get any better or more hassle free than this, get online and give us a try!Explore our easy to use online menus and you'll wonder how you put up with keeping dogged eared paper ones for so long, we allow you to get an at a glance overview of all Immy's Spice Ranch have to offer offer and to order food online with little more than the touch of a button. With Immy's open seven days a week between 17:00 and midnight (and an hour later on Friday and Saturday) this amounts to a real double shot of convenience for you. Try out the special curry selections on offer, and our Chef will provide some expertly prepared and red hot cuisine or how about pizza, Southern fried chicken or a kebab? The choice is all yours.Immy's Spice Ranch, 4 Tyersal Road, Bradford offers exactly what you want when you want it, in partnership with MyHungryBelly.com.

Indian Spice (Stainbeck Road)

Indian Spice is the place to be for delicious, expertly prepared Indian cuisine. If you're in Leeds and looking for all the quality of a great curry restaurant in the comfort of your own home then look no further! We've made it more accessible than ever with the simple and secure service we offer at My Hungry Belly- the web's premier online ordering service in the UK. With this partnership it is so easy to get a full Indian meal, it's like having your own personal Chef. Try us and we guarantee you'll be back for more.Indian Spice offers a wonderful variety of dishes, just give our easy to use online menu a look though and you'll find new delights and old favourites for every curry lover. Tandoori specialities, biryani, traditional dishes, appetisers and more! Open from five to elven every single night with free delivery from LS1 to LS9 on orders of at least six pounds, Indian Spice is there when you need it. My Hungry Belly is the easiest way to order food online and the simplest way to get a high quality meal on your table, period.So online order takeaway today with Indian Spice, 97 Stainbeck Road, Leeds and experience the best, the easy way.

Benny's Chicken (Granby Street)

Benny's Chicken Shop is located on Granby Street in Leicester. Ordering food online from MyHungryBelly is simple and easy. Benny's Chicken offers afree delivery service Benny's offers a wide range of meals such as Pizzas, Salads, Burgers, Donners, Kebabs, Grilled Chicken, Wraps, Sides, Desserts, Drinks, Platters, Special Offers, Biryani's and Meal Deals. Benny's also offers a free delivery service within a 3 mile radius on all orders over £8. Place an order online though MyHungryBelly.comIf you've never tried online ordering then this is the best place to start. The service is set up to be as secure and easy to use as possible to set a new standard in online order takeaway. We do this by finding the best local takeaways and making them more accessiable that ever. Benny's Chicken is a prime example. A quality and diverse selection of food, available seven days a week between nine and midnight. Make your order online with us, with no more than a few button clicks and the hard working staff at Benny's will provide the rest guaranteeing a delicious night in, not to mention value for money.So check out Benny's Chicken, 83 Granby Street, Leicester and MyHungryBelly.com we'll change the way you think about takeaway food and online ordering!

Kebab Ranch has two takeaways, one is situated on Great Horton Road and the other is situated on Main Street. They are one of the most impressive local takeaways situated in Bradford. Offering mouth watering Starters, Burgers, SFC, Balti's, Curries, Set Meals and Pizzas.

Ordering from Kebab Ranch through MyHungryBelly is simple and straightforward. You don't even have to leave the comfort of your own home just simply log onto MyHungryBelly select Kebab Ranch from the list of takeaways that have joined with MyHungryBelly and place your order online. You can choose to either pay by cash when the delivery man arrives or pay securely online at no extra cost!

Offering a free delivery service on orders over £6.00 for Great Horton and £8.50 for Main Street within a 3 mile radius, you can't go wrong when ordering online from Kebab Ranch through MyHungryBelly. So if you're wanting to satisfy your hungry belly look not further. Kebab Ranch is here to satisfy your hunger needs. Open seven days a week from 5pm till late each night.

Kebab Ranch is one of the many local restaurants in Bradford that offer free food delivery. So don't delay, start ordering food online today through MyHungryBelly.com

Belisimo's Pizzas

When you take a bite out of life it can leave you famished and without the energy to cook or prepare yourself some decent grub.

If you’ve never tried online orderingbefore, here is a great place to start. Established for many years as one of the very best local takeaways in Leeds, Krunch’s dedicated staff will be more than happy to take your order and help you overcome those hunger blues. Open seven days a week between 4pm and 11, the great food is there whenever you need it, plus free delivery on orders over six pounds in the local area. If that doesn’t sound stress-free enough, you can now get it all with a few button clicks thanks to MyHungryBelly, an unbelievably simple and user friendly way to order food online.

So banish hunger from your hectic life with Krunch, 33 Chapeltown, Leeds and MyHungryBelly.com!

Mr-B (Tong Street)

Here at MyHungryBelly, we know how it can be after straining through another tough day of work, study or caring for your family. Which is why we have hand selected some of the country's best takeaways including Bradford's finest. When you talk in those terms one of the names that jumps out at you is Mr B, known for bringing the true taste of Kashmir right to your doorstep. Now with the aid of our secure online ordering service and Mr B's great food, value and service there's no need to make do without the very best again.

Mr B's offers a comprehensive selection of all your favourite dishes, hand prepared with a home cooked flavour. It's like have your own personal chef on call! Curry, pizza, burgers, kebabs, SFC, wraps and paninis are all on offer, and that's just the start of it. The briefest browse of our user friendly menus will have your mouth watering with dishes such as the great value meal deals and sizzling specialities such as the Mixed Tandoori Grill Special to name just two of the treats available on demand. So why not order food online today care of Mr B, 389 Tong Street, Bradfordand MyHungryBelly.com?

Order Takeaway Food today with Naeem's Tandoori, 62 Stainbeck Road, Leeds and MyHungryBelly.com. Why settle for anything less than the best?

Don't delay order today care of Nafeez, 461 Otley Road, Bradford and MyHungryBelly.com for a takeaway experience like no other!

All in all Naseeb offer a paradise for lovers of curry and more so don't miss out!

Order food online today with the click of a button care of Naseeb, 6-12 Clayton Road, Bradford and MyHungryBelly.com
